scenario_text.value: Where...are we?

Oh no, did I get so lost in thought I forgot
where I was going? What is wrong with me?
Aoi, maybe we should rest a bit.

Oh, that’s okay, Labramon. Actually, I’m
feeling pretty good right now.

But you look so pale... I’m worried about
you, Aoi.
(Labramon is so nice to me.)

(Always at my side, no matter what
happens...)

(Actually... I’ve been ignoring Labramon’s
feelings because of my sadness, haven’t I?)
I’m sorry.
I don’t know what’s gotten into me...
Uhh, Aoi?

I’ve been clinging to a past I can never get
back, focused only on my own sadness.

Even though I talked about harmony and
cooperation, I was more selfish than anyone.

(But all this has helped me see the light.
I know how I can bring peace to this world.)
Um, are you okay, Aoi?
I wonder if everyone’s worried about me...
(Just like I was worried about them...)
Of course they are! They’re your friends!
Yeah... I know.

(But then, why did they leave me all alone
when I was so sad?)

(If it was the other way around... If I was
them, I wouldn’t have turned a blind eye.)

(I would’ve found a way to bring back whoever
was hurting, somehow...)
(Wait a minute.)
...Can I ask you something, Labramon?

Why did you come with me? Were you too scared
to try and stop me?
Stop you? From doing what?
(From doing what I’m trying to do...)

(Bringing everyone together...for the greater
good.)

(But how can I bring everyone together? How
can I make them feel what I feel?)
No... This won’t work.
What are you talking about, Aoi?
Sorry.

I’m not so sure myself. My mind feels cloudy,
and my chest feels like it’s about to burst.
Who can I rely on now, Labramon? Who?

(Saki’s gone. No one understands how I feel.
I’m alone... I’m still so alone...)

What about me? Am I not good enough to take
Saki’s place?
Do you feel sorry for me?

No, that’s not it. I’m your partner, that’s
all.
My partner, huh...

Yeah, your partner! That’s why I’ll stick
with you no matter what!

I’m not human so I don’t know how much help
I can be, but even so...

I’ll always be here by your side, wherever
you end up.

So tell me what you’re going through. I want
to hear about your regrets, your sorrows,

your fears...everything! I’m here for you,
Aoi, and all that’s in your heart.

(I... I’m not alone after all! Labramon is
the only one who understands me.)
(And I never even noticed...)
Sorry... I’m so sorry, Labramon...
Come on, Aoi. A simple “thanks!” is enough!

Right... Thanks, Labramon. With you at my
side, I—
Rrgh... *cough, cough*

What was that? I heard something behind those
bushes...
Who’s there?!
Ugh... Ngh!
Oh my gosh... It’s you!
Why’s Piedmon here?! Watch out, Aoi!

He’s hurt really badly! He’ll die if we leave
him like this!
Aoi!

(Piedmon is the enemy. But then again, he was
tricked by the Master just like us, so...)
Labramon... Heal his wounds.
...What?
Please.
Stay... Stay back!

It’s your loss if you wanna be stubborn. You
don’t even have the strength to resist.

Human... Why would you... *huff, huff*
...help me?

You’re very strong. You really gave us a run
for our money.

You know this world is on the brink of
annihilation, don’t you?

Yeah... So what? *huff, huff* I don’t get
humans like you...

Fighting us while the world falls apart won’t
change anything. And yet...

If you work WITH us, we might be able to do
something about it together.

(Yes. I’m sure we can all come to understand
one another, like Labramon and me...)

(We all need to come together if we want this
world to be at peace. Not just the humans.)

(The monsters must work together with us,
too!)
So you wanna join forces, eh?
I’ll heal him... But keep your guard up, Aoi.

Okay, he’s better now. A little bit, at
least.

Good job. Now, Piedmon... What do you say
about my offer?
The answer’s obvious, isn’t it?

(I knew it. He wants to join forces with us!
I even managed to get through to—!)

Who the HELL would work with you?! After
everything you humans have done!
What?
Agh... Nngh!
Oh, no... Aoi!
*cough, cough* What...is happening?
My body hurts...all over...
No! Aoi, no! This...this is terrible!
Haha... Hahaha... Ahahahaha! You fool!

You really thought a little human compassion
would win me over?!
You...tricked me?

I only wish I could see the looks on your
friends’ faces when they find you dead!

Well done, human! Your pitiful kindness saved
my life!

Perish with me, humans! Killed by your own
kindness! Hahaha!
...Unnngh... Agh...
AOI!!
(Ahh... Is this...my time to die?)

(My heart... I can feel the beating getting
weaker...)

(Why? Where did I go wrong? Was it wrong to
think we could live in peace and harmony?)
Aoi! No, wait! With my power, I’ll...
Don’t you dare interfere!
Augh!
Lab...ramon...!

Aoi, my partner... I’m coming...to save
you...

(No, not Labramon, too... Always trying...to
help me...)

(It’s like Saki all over again! After I’d
finally figured things out, too...)
(I finally found the right answer!)

Hahaha! How beautiful to watch a hated enemy
die!

Why? I just wanted to understand you... Are
harmony and cooperation...so wrong?

You think a human like you could ever
understand me? Don’t be stupid!

This can’t be real... That means everything
I realized, it was all...a lie?

(Was I wrong this entire time? Is it possible
for me to save anyone...?)
Someone...please... Tell me the right answer!

(It’s cold... Save me, Labramon...
Someone...)
Aoi!
(That voice!)
Aoi... Labramon!
What the hell! What happened to you?!
This is terrible...
Hah! You were too late.
Did you do this, you bastard?!
Aoi! Labramon! We’re here to save you!

Not so fast! You think I’d let you anywhere
near them?
Miu! Piedmon’s heading your way!
Look out!
Bah! Don’t you dare interfere!
Kaito!
Ugh! Miu... You all right?
Yeah! I’m fine, thanks to you!
But... But... Aoi! And Labramon!
Aoi! Labramon!
Dammit! Outta my way, Piedmon!

We...we have to hurry and treat Aoi’s
injuries, or she’ll...!

Yes, YES! That’s it! Those are the faces
I wanted to see!

Watch as she takes her last breaths! Sad,
don’t you think? Hahaha!
Shut up. We’re not gonna sit back and watch!
(Everyone’s fighting...again...)
